Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about current events and news is coming at them from every angle. From Federal Budget surprises to hydrogen production funds to disappointing NDIS projections there's a lot to unpack. With some disappointed at the lack of help for all Australians and advocates dismayed at NDIS's cost-containment it seems like everyone has an opinion on what's going on. And we're all waiting with bated breath for the budget replies and the state budget to see what else we can expect.
